 CxList write = 	All.FindByMemberAccess("streamwriter.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("streamwriter.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("binarywriter.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("bufferedstream.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("filestream.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("memorystream.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("stream.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("streamwriter.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("stringwriter.write*")+
	All.FindByMemberAccess("textwriter.write*");
result = write;
